body: The budget of this task is **30 mins**. This is exactly how much time will be compensated, when the task is completed.
@lthuangiang can you please help? Keep in mind [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles). If you have any technical questions, don't hesitate to ask right here
@dmarkov we should provide default implementation for `RtGitignores` first. so put this ticket on hold.

@dmarkov @yegor256 because this ticket was created a long time ago, but there is no puzzle and no issue which was created to implement default functions for  `RtGitignores`. So i would like to create new enhancement here #212

issue.title: RtGitignores should implement default functions (List all templates available and Get a single template)

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
Because the integration test for `RtGitignores` was created a long time ago, but there is no puzzle and no issue which was created to implement default functions for  `RtGitignores`. So i would like to create new enhancement here to implement default functions for `RtGitignores`

Key functions need to implement:
- `RtGitignores` can iterate over all available gitignore templates
-  `RtGitignores` can get a single gitignore template

Please refer to API: http://developer.github.com/v3/gitignore/#gitignore

issue.title: Issue #212: implement RtGitignores.

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body: Issue #212: RtGitignores is implemented without tests.

body: @yegor256 Pull request was submitted at #318 . Please review. Thanks.
@lthuangiang I added **30 mins** to your account, many thanks for working with the project!
